samples.context: In girls, breast size begins to increase, with darkening of the skin of the nipples at the tips of the breasts. Also, girls begin to menstruate at around this time.
samples.question: What changes occur in girls during adolescence?

samples.context: Boys begin to have new thick hair growth on the face and their voices begin to crack.
samples.question: What are the facial changes in boys?

samples.context: Further, the penis occasionally begins to become enlarged and erect, either in daydreams or at night.
samples.question: What happens to boys' penises during adolescence?

samples.context: In girls, breast size begins to increase, with darkening of the skin of the nipples at the tips of the breasts.
samples.question: What happens to girls' breasts during puberty?

samples.context: Also, girls begin to menstruate at around this time.
samples.question: At what age do girls typically start menstruating?
